reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, soft, and well-made, with a nice oversized fit that's loose enough to wear a sports bra.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing! One of my favorites definitely üòç
items.body: Cozy oversized black knit sweater This oversized black knit sweater is absolutely perfect. The fabric is soft warm and comfortable without feeling heavy. The fit is relaxed and flattering making it easy to layer over anything. It looks great with jeans leggings or even dressed up with boots. The quality is excellent and it holds its shape after washing without shrinking or pilling. It feels stylish yet cozy and is now one of my favorite go to sweaters for everyday wear. Read more
items.author: Yaniela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Off shoulder sweater
items.body: I‚Äôm absolutely in love with this Knit Batwing Long Sleeve Crochet Pullover because the design is stylish and flattering, with the batwing sleeves giving it a cozy, relaxed fit. The crochet knit pattern looks beautiful and adds such a nice touch of texture. It‚Äôs soft, warm, affordable, perfect for layering in cooler weather. I‚Äôve gotten so many compliments every time I wear it. It comes in different colors and styles that I can't wait to collect them all. Read more
items.author: Clarisbell Alvarez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not off shoulder
items.body: Sweater is pretty and soft. It also fits nicely without being to clingy. The only thing wrong is the neckline is not made to fall off shoulder. I ordered a size up and it was still not a wide neckline. I kept it because it is pretty and comfortable but disappointed that it is not off shoulder. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Title: Stylish, Cozy, and Effortlessly Chic
items.body: I absolutely love this Cakulo off-the-shoulder sweater! The oversized knit design is incredibly comfortable and feels soft against the skin. The batwing long sleeves add a trendy, relaxed look, while the crochet-style fabric gives it a unique and elegant touch. It drapes beautifully on the body and can be dressed up or down with ease. Perfect for cooler days when you want to stay warm without sacrificing style. Highly recommend this sweater for anyone looking for a fashionable and cozy wardrobe staple! Read more
items.author: KARLA QUIROS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and Stylish Sweater
items.body: I love this sweater! The knit design looks beautiful in person, and the off-shoulder style gives it a cute, relaxed look. It feels soft, warm, and comfortable without being too heavy. The fit is slightly oversized in a flattering way, which makes it perfect for jeans or leggings. Great quality for the price ‚Äî I‚Äôve already worn it several times and gotten compliments. Totally recommended! Read more
items.author: Thalia Fundora

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sweater runs Large in Size
items.body: Bought for a gift for my granddaughter. Although it is super soft and a cute style, it is Huge in size... The photo makes it look true to size. I ordered a medium and it looks like an extra large! Not true to size. Read more
items.author: JS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I exceed my expectations
items.body: The blouse has a soft and light fabric, ideal to wear all day without feeling uncomfortable. The fabric is delicate but well made, with a simple design that makes it easy to combine. It can be used for any occasion, either for a casual everyday look or something more arranged. I really liked how it falls and how comfortable it feels when using it. Read more
items.author: Lorena Acosta

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: The crochet knit pattern looks beautiful and adds a nice touch of texture. This oversized knit sweater is absolutely perfect. The fabric is soft, warm, and comfortable without feeling heavy. The fit is relaxed and flattering, making it easy to layer over anything. I'm in love with this sweater; the color is amazing, and the fabric quality is very good. It is soft and comfortable. It fits perfectly and looks even better in person. A wonderful value for money. Read more
items.author: Isabel

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Z- Bow Pink, Z- Bow Navy Blue, Dark Grey, Apricot, Black, Coffee, Y- Flower Khaki, Z- Bow Black, Red Dahlia Brown, Light Pink, Xmas Dog, Grey, Z- Pink Bow White, Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
